name: ep_weave
description: Link all pads using Hash inspired by Squeak Swiki and Scrapbox

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.index.json && tsc -p tsconfig.editor.json && mv lib/pad/static/js/* lib/static/js/ && rm -fr lib/pad/static && mv lib/pad/* lib/ && rm -fr lib/pad && cp -fr src/pad/templates lib/ && cp -fr src/pad/static/css lib/static/ && cp -fr lib/static .
